# Kingsley Advani (entrepreneur)

}}
Kingsley Advani is a businessman known for his work in financial technology (fintech), particularly in the areas of private market investments and digital asset tokenization. He is the founder of the investment platform Allocations and was named to the Forbes 30 Under 30 list in 2023.
Career
Advani began his career in technology and finance. His early involvement in cryptocurrency trading was reported by various financial outlets, which served as a catalyst for his transition into the fintech industry.
In 2022, Advani founded Allocations, an investment platform focused on private market securities and alternative assets for accredited investors and financial advisors.  The platform's technology was reported to reduce administrative setup times for investment deals. In 2025, the platform's total value was reported to have exceeded $2 billion.
Advani has been noted for his commentary on the future of digital assets and asset tokenization. He has discussed the potential for tokenizing real-world assets such as private equity and real estate to expand market liquidity and accessibility. He has also provided analysis on the development of digital asset regulations in markets including South Korea and the United Arab Emirates.
